channel.title: Does a server costs money?
channel.description:
hi, im verry verry new to this, but i do want to make my own server. some guy told me it whas going to cost real life cash, is this true? and if so. howmuch money?.
ty, Sara
PS. if it doesn't cost anything and you want to make some runescape gp's, then ill pay to learn me making my dreamserver ;)[br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2007, 05:36:32 AM[/size][hr]i know. this looks like a spam. but somebody HAS to help me now please.

item.title: Does a server costs money?
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

I don’t think you’re going to get a lot of people helping you. As fed said

Fr33sc4p3:

and its about development,

^^^^^ This means you have to learn and make it yourself. All you need to do is go into the download section, download a source, then read some tutorials. Thats pretty much all the help you’re gonna get…

Read full topic

item.title: Does a server costs money?
item.dc:creator: @bladezz bladezz
item.description:
@bladezz wrote:

ok, thank you verry much. now my LAST question. Will anyone, please help me with making my server. with this i mean, what do i need to download?, where do i have to put the codes, etc.
just say “ill help”, and ill give you my msn adress. Thank You all. And please, help me :P[br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2007, 06:15:46 AM[/size][hr]…

Read full topic

item.description:

as example… could i have one server online for other peaple,one year long. for free?

item.title: Does a server costs money?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

medal_star90:

It shoulnt cost money at all for the poiint being poeple want to have fun and a good time.

No, its not.

This communitys purpose is to learn, and its about development, if you are here for just fun then you should leave now.
